name: Galacthicc
description:
This is a 2D Space shooter Game. Features include:

  1. Revamped the main menu
  2.  Added three different power ups (weapon evolve, attack speed, movement speed) that work upon pick up and improve the space craft
  3. Three different levels with unique mechanics (enemy spawning, enemy movement, enemy attack speed!)
  4. Life counters added to showcase the remaining lives
